original_text: And the guards stood, every man with his weapons in his hand, from the south side of the house to the north side of the house, around the altar and the house on behalf of the king.
korean_text: 호위병이 각각 손에 무기를 잡고 왕을 호위하되 성전 오른쪽에서부터 왼쪽까지 제단과 성전 곁에 서고

sentences.original_text: every man with his weapons in his hand,
from the south side of the house to the north side of the house,
around the altar and the house
